BG Company

BG Company is passionate about revolutionizing the way the world generates and uses energy. With a commitment to sustainability and innovation, BG Company specializes in creating custom clean energy generators under a flagship product line, Legion. The mission is to empower businesses and individuals alike with environmentally friendly energy solutions tailored to meet specific needs and applications.

Who We Are

Founded on the principles of environmental stewardship and technological advancement, BG Company combines cutting-edge engineering with a deep understanding of energy requirements across various sectors. As a sustainability advocate dedicated to designing and developing custom energy solutions that make a difference.

Legion

The Legion series of clean energy generators is at the forefront of the renewable energy movement. Each generator is meticulously designed and built to suit a wide range of applications, including:

  • Electric Vehicles (EVs): Power your electric vehicle with our efficient generators, ensuring a clean and sustainable energy source.
  • Electric Vertical Takeoff and Landing (eVTOL): Experience the future of transportation with our custom solutions that meet the unique challenges of aerial mobility.
  • Electric Airplanes: Our generators provide the energy needed for the next generation of air travel, contributing to the reduction of carbon emissions in aviation.
  • Electric Ships: Revolutionize maritime transport with our advanced energy solutions designed to power electric ships, promoting cleaner oceans.
  • Commercial Applications: From powering businesses to supporting critical infrastructure, our generators deliver reliable energy tailored to your operational needs.
  • Residential Solutions: Experience energy independence with our home generators, designed to provide clean energy for your living space.

Commitment to Sustainability

BG Company has an understanding that the future of energy lies in sustainability. This understanding and commitment extends beyond just developing innovative products. Continuously improving technologies to enhance efficiency and minimize environmental impact.

Why BG Company?

  • Custom Solutions: Working closely with clients to design and manufacture generators that perfectly fit their specific requirements. Why? because every application is unique.
  • Quality and Reliability: Generators built using the highest quality materials and advanced engineering practices, ensuring reliability and longevity.
  • Customer-Centric Approach: Prioritizing client needs with dedicated support from consultation through installation and beyond.
  • Vision for the Future: Shaping a more sustainable future for generations to come as pioneers in the clean energy space,

Join the Movement

BG Company is making a difference in the clean energy landscape. Along with you, a sustainable future is closer, one generator at a time.

GENERATING

THE

FUTURE

SECTION 1 – Cancellations

Cancellations may be requested at any time prior to the shipment of your order. All cancellations are subject to the terms and conditions outlined below.

SECTION 2 – Refunds

All refunds are subject processing fees and said fees are based on the payment method used at the time of purchase as well as the time the refund request was made. Please contact info@legion-gen.com to obtain possible fees. All purchasers have 15 days to request a refund. To initiate a refund email info@legion-gen.com.

All refunds requested following the initial 15 day time period and prior to shipping are subjected to a partial refund equivalent to the order total less processing fees (to include processing fees incurred at the time of purchase and any fees required to return payment) as well as a 10% restocking fee. The 10-50% restock fee will be applied to the product purchase price not including shipping or taxes. Restocking fee are determined based on the development stage of the product ordered by the purchaser.

SECTION 3 – Returns

All return requests should be sent by email to info@legion-gen.com. Returns may be initiated at any time upon product receipt and before the 30 days elapsed after said product receipt by the purchaser. All returns requested are subject to a restocking fee as well as transaction fees. Refunds amounts that are the result of a return are equivalent to the order total less processing fees (to include processing fees incurred at the time of purchase and any transaction fees required to return the purchaser’s payment) as well as a 30-50% restocking fee. The 30-50% restocking fee will be applied to the product purchase price not including shipping or taxes. All return requests are processed upon receipt of the return request. A refund subject to the aforementioned will be disbursed provided the below conditions are met:

– Products should be unused and unopened.

– Original and undamaged packaging required.

All Returns within 30 days and will be refunded within 14 days of receipt and verification of the purchased item. Return shipping costs are covered by the purchaser.

If 30 days has elapsed from date the of product receipt by the purchaser, no refund or exchange will be issued. To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that it was received. It must also be in the original packaging.

To complete your return, receipt or proof of purchase is required. There are no exceptions. Once a return is received and inspected, an email sell be sent to purchaser to notify you that the subject item has been received. A follow up email will be sent acknowledging the approval or rejection of your refund. If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment.

Late or Missing Refunds (if applicable):

If the purchaser has been notified that a refund has been issued and the purchaser has not received the refund:

– Check your bank account again.

– Contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

– Contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

– If all of the aforementioned has been completed and the purchaser has not received a refund, submit an inquiry to info@legion-gen.com.

SECTION 4 – Shipping

To return your product, please email info@legion-gen.com.

The purchaser is responsible for shipping costs associated with returning the item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If the purchaser receives a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund amount, provided the return shipping not handled by the purchaser. Any return initiated by the purchaser, must be tracked and tracked by the purchaser. The seller will not be responsible for any return shipping handled by the purchaser.

SECTION 1 – Introduction

BG Company is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled in a safe and responsible manner. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you visit our website www.legion-gen.com (the “Site”) and purchase products therein.

SECTION 2 – Information We Collect

We may collect the following types of information:

· Personal Information: When you create an account, place an order, or contact us, we may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, billing address, shipping address, and payment information.

· Non-Personal Information: We may collect non-personal information about your interactions with our Site, including your IP address, browser type, device information, pages visited, and the time and date of your visit.

· Cookies and Tracking Technologies: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our Site. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

·

SECTION 3 – How We Use Your Information

We may use your information for the following purposes:

· To process and fulfill your orders.

· To communicate with you regarding your orders, inquiries, and customer support.

· To improve our products, services, and website functionality.

· To send you promotional materials, newsletters, and other marketing communications (you can opt-out at any time).

· To comply with legal obligations and protect our rights.

SECTION 4 – Information Sharing and Disclosure

We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties without your consent, except in the following circumstances:

· Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our Site, conducting our business, or servicing you (e.g., payment processors, shipping companies).

· Legal Compliance: We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities.

· Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of our assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction.

SECTION 5 – Data Security

We implement a variety of security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

SECTION 6 – Your Rights

You have the right to:

· Access, correct, or delete your personal information.

· Withdraw your consent for us to process your personal information.

· Opt-out of receiving marketing communications.

To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.

SECTION 7 – Third-Party Links

Our Site may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of those websites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit.

SECTION 8 – Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on our Site with a new effective date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any updates.

SECTION 9 – Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at info@legion-gen.com
